title: 26h PBE login timer
body:
riot pls i just wanted to log in in pbe and got a queue timer of freakin 26h37min ar you kidding me? 
i know everyone is hyped because TFT but 26h? make something against this PLS thats not normal anymore......

replies.body: Of course it is normal when half of all League players from all around the world are trying to log in to the PBE that you have a long queue time. The PBE was not created to play, it was created to test things.

And again... PBE is not like a live server. No there will be no 2nd PBE Server. And no again the queue time won't get shorter. And you could just wait, a few days until it hits live so, yeah...

BTW we got a PBE board regarding everything related to the PBE....
Chill solltest jetzt drinne sein XD

Die können nicht einfach die kapazitäten dementsprechend erhöhen.
Warte bis zum 25.
